title: Osananajimi Wa, Nyaa To Naite Skirt No Naka.
alternative_title: 幼馴染は、にゃあと鳴いてスカートのなか。 ; My Childhood Friend Goes Meow From Under My Skirt.
status: 幼馴染は、にゃあと鳴いてスカートのなか。 ; My Childhood Friend Goes Meow From Under My Skirt.
description:
Description :
        In the cat-filled town of Miyakecho, there is an urban legend that says cats sometimes put curses on humans. Ichika and Maki were once childhood friends until a certain incident led them to stop talking to each other. When Maki rushes in to save a mysterious white cat from an oncoming truck, however, she somehow finds herself under the cat's curse with Ichika being the only one she can turn to for help.
